text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, huh, huh!? My body feels all warm and tingly!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's like I'm brimming with power, or my usual normal self has become a slightly amazing normal self...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Could it be thanks to the Three Goddesses?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alrighty! I'm gonna run with all my might~!
